articles.author: Jason Reid
articles.title: For Patrick Mahomes, Kansas City Chiefs, now the grind begins - Andscape
articles.description: KANSAS CITY, Mo. – Buffalo Bills, Denver Broncos, Indianapolis Colts. That’s the gauntlet the Kansas City Chiefs face in their next three games – a key stretch that figures to both provide a clearer picture of the remainder of the Chiefs’ season and the devel…
articles.content:
